title: Why am I still lvl 1 here im lvl 30 ??? PLEASE HELP!!!
body: I'm really lvl 30 bronze 4 but it still says I'm lvl one on this site please help

replies.body: It looks like your boards profile has been sync'd with your post here!  Please let us know if you have any further issues posting in other areas of the boards.
Your level is updated shortly after making a post, so you should already be able to post since your level is refreshed.
